text:
How do I resample data in Julia? I have tick data and I'd like to resample it so that I only keep the rows with the first instance of each second? For example in what is shown below I would only like to keep the first row and the others would be discarded. Thanks.

2021-01-04 09:30:02:006
2021-01-04 09:30:02:008
2021-01-04 09:30:02:012
2021-01-04 09:30:02:014

text: you can use Dates to parse these into DateTime objects, floor to the seconds, and then use `unique` to get the first occurence of each duplicate

elements.text: you can use Dates to parse these into DateTime objects, floor to the seconds, and then use
to get the first occurence of each duplicate

text: maybe there is a more elegant way, but that's off the top of my head
